metadata.title: RHSA-2019:3041: Red Hat OpenShift Service Mesh 1.0.1 RPMs (Important)
metadata.description:
Red Hat OpenShift Service Mesh is Red Hat's distribution of the Istio service mesh project, tailored for installation into an on-premise OpenShift Container Platform installation.

This advisory covers the RPM packages for the OpenShift Service Mesh 1.0.1 release.

Security Fix(es):

* HTTP/2: large amount of data requests leads to denial of service (CVE-2019-9511)

* HTTP/2: flood using PRIORITY frames results in excessive resource consumption (CVE-2019-9513)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS
score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

bugzilla.text: CVE-2019-9513 HTTP/2: flood using PRIORITY frames results in excessive resource consumption
HTTP/2: large amount of data requests leads to denial of service

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 is installed
kiali is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
